text: James Lewis (August 29, 1854 - May 23, 1929) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Saint John City from 1925 to 1929. ==References== Category:1854 births Category:1929 deaths Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:People from Saint John, New Brunswick Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: James Lewis (Canadian politician)
